016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.benchmarks.reactivestreams;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder.ConfigurationBuilder;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.core.Xorcery;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithResult;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ReactiveStreamsServer;
027import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.server.ReactiveStreamsServerConfiguration;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
030import org.openjdk.jmh.annotations.*;
031import org.openjdk.jmh.runner.Runner;
032import org.openjdk.jmh.runner.options.OptionsBuilder;
033import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
034import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
035import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
036
037import java.util.concurrent.*;
038import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
039
040@State(Scope.Benchmark)
041@Fork(value = 1, warmups = 1, jvmArgs = "-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote=true")
042@Warmup(iterations = 1)
043@Measurement(iterations = 3)
044public class PublishSubscriberWithResultBenchmarks {
045
046    private static final String config = """
047            secrets.enabled: true
048            keystores.enabled: true
049            dns.client.enabled: true
050                        
051            jetty.client.enabled: true
052            jetty.client.ssl.enabled: true
053            reactivestreams.client.enabled: true
054
055            metrics.enabled: false
056            metrics.filter:
057                - xorcery:*
058            metrics.subscriber.authority: localhost:443    
059            """;
060
061    private static final String clientConfig = """
062            instance.id: client
063            """;
064
065    private static final String serverConfig = """
066            instance.id: server
067            jetty.server.enabled: true
068            jetty.server.ssl.enabled: true
069            jetty.server.ssl.port: 8443
070            reactivestreams.server.enabled: true
071            """;
072
073    private ClientPublisher clientPublisher;
074    private CompletableFuture<Void> stream;
075
076    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
077
078        new Runner(new OptionsBuilder()
079                .include(PublishSubscriberWithResultBenchmarks.class.getSimpleName() + ".*")
080                .forks(0)
081                .jvmArgs("-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote=true")
082                .build()).run();
083    }
084
085    private Xorcery server;
086    private Xorcery client;
087
088    AtomicInteger total = new AtomicInteger();
089/*
090    ArrayBlockingQueue<String> queue = new ArrayBlockingQueue<>(10000);
091    AtomicInteger writeCount = new AtomicInteger();
092*/
093
094    @Setup()
095    public void setup() throws Exception {
096
097        Configuration serverConf = new ConfigurationBuilder().addTestDefaults().addYaml(config).addYaml(serverConfig).build();
098        System.out.println(serverConf);
099        server = new Xorcery(serverConf);
100        ReactiveStreamsServer reactiveStreams = server.getServiceLocator().getService(ReactiveStreamsServer.class);
101        Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
102
103        // Server subscriber
104        ServerSubscriber<WithResult<WithMetadata<String>, Integer>> serverSubscriber = new ServerSubscriber<>() {
105            int i = 0;
106            int batchSize = 1024 * 4;
107
108            @Override
109            public void onNext(WithResult<WithMetadata<String>, Integer> item) {
110                item.result().complete(item.event().event().length());
111                i++;
112                if (i % batchSize == 0) {
113                    subscription.request(batchSize);
114                }
115            }
116        };
117
118        reactiveStreams.subscriber("serversubscriber", cfg -> serverSubscriber, (Class<? extends Subscriber<?>>) serverSubscriber.getClass());
119
120        // Client publisher
121        Configuration configuration = new ConfigurationBuilder().addTestDefaults().addYaml(config).addYaml(clientConfig).build();
122        client = new Xorcery(configuration);
123        clientPublisher = new ClientPublisher();
124
125        ReactiveStreamsClient reactiveStreamsClient = client.getServiceLocator().getService(ReactiveStreamsClient.class);
126        stream = reactiveStreamsClient.publish(ReactiveStreamsServerConfiguration.get(configuration).getURI(), "serversubscriber",
127                Configuration::empty, clientPublisher, (Class<? extends Publisher<?>>) clientPublisher.getClass(), ClientConfiguration.defaults());
128
129        logger.info("Setup done");
130    }
131
132    @TearDown
133    public void teardown() throws Exception {
134        stream.complete(null);
135//        clientPublisher.getDone().get();
136        client.close();
137        server.close();
138        LogManager.getLogger().info("Teardown done");
139        LogManager.getLogger().info("Total:" + total.get());
140    }
141
142    @Benchmark
143    @BenchmarkMode(Mode.Throughput)
144    public void writes() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, TimeoutException {
145
146        CompletableFuture<Integer> integerCompletableFuture = new CompletableFuture<>();
147        integerCompletableFuture.whenComplete((i, t) -> total.addAndGet(i));
148        clientPublisher.publish(new WithResult<>(new WithMetadata<>(new Metadata.Builder()
149                .add("foo", "bar")
150                .build(), System.currentTimeMillis() + ""), integerCompletableFuture));
151    }
152
153    public static abstract class ServerSubscriber<T>
154            implements Subscriber<T> {
155
156        protected Subscription subscription;
157
158        @Override
159        public void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
160            this.subscription = subscription;
161            subscription.request(8192);
162        }
163
164        @Override
165        public void onError(Throwable throwable) {
166
167        }
168
169        @Override
170        public void onComplete() {
171        }
172    }
173
174    public static class ClientPublisher
175            implements Publisher<WithResult<WithMetadata<String>, Integer>> {
176
177        private final CompletableFuture<Void> done = new CompletableFuture<>();
178        private final Semaphore semaphore = new Semaphore(0);
179        private Subscriber<? super WithResult<WithMetadata<String>, Integer>> subscriber;
180
181        public void publish(WithResult<WithMetadata<String>, Integer> item) throws InterruptedException {
182            if (!semaphore.tryAcquire(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS)) {
183                // Try again
184                publish(item);
185            }
186            subscriber.onNext(item);
187        }
188
189        public CompletableFuture<Void> getDone() {
190            return done;
191        }
192
193        @Override
194        public void subscribe(Subscriber<? super WithResult<WithMetadata<String>, Integer>> subscriber) {
195            this.subscriber = subscriber;
196            subscriber.onSubscribe(new Subscription() {
197                @Override
198                public void request(long n) {
199                    semaphore.release((int) n);
200//                    LogManager.getLogger().warn("Current requests:" + semaphore.availablePermits());
201                }
202
203                @Override
204                public void cancel() {
205                    done.complete(null);
206                }
207            });
208        }
209    }
210}
